related_configuration:
<module name="TreeWalker">
        <module name="AnnotationLocation">
          <property name="id" value="MethodAnnotationLocation"/>
          <property name="tokens" value=" METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, COMPACT_CTOR_DEF"/>

    </module>
explanation: AnnotationLocation can not check the location of method annotations
